name: Sai Pratishthan
briefDescription: Sai Pratishthan is Located in Beed, Maharashtra.Beed district is known as back word district in all over maharashtra. Beed is known as sugar cane cutters district in Maharashtra. Beed district sugar cane cutter lab our migrate to pune sangli solapur for sugar cutting. Six month they are in Beed district and another six month they stay at sugar factory. So there children are six month in school and other six month they drop out. So this is major issue in Beed district. So organization think about drop children in Beed district marathwada. Organization think about the start hostel in beed district for sugar cane cutter lab ours children. So Issue about child lab our also cover by this hostel.
